title: The correct fluid for your polaris transmission
description: This is the stuff you need for the transmission.  I change mine regularly and have had no transmission issues at all.  When I drain the fluid there is little to no metal on the magnetic drain plug.  Many thousands of miles without failure.
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023

title: Buy on Amazon to save money as opposed to at the dealership
description: Like buying my RZR lubricants off Amazon as they are cheaper than at the dealership, also like to buy larger quantities for additional savings. Polaris could possibly void our warranty if we have warranty work done on the RZR and we are using other brands besides their OEM lubricants.
